full_description:
MSI PRO DP180 13th Gen Core i5 512GB SSD Desktop PC

The MSI PRO DP180 13th Gen Core i5 Desktop PC delivers unrivaled performance, expertly engineered to suit the needs of modern computing. At its heart is the powerful Intel Core i5-13400 CPU, which has an amazing 20M cache and a clock speed that can be turbo boosted up to 4.60 GHz. Whether you're doing resource-intensive chores, gaming, or creating content, this powerhouse provides a smooth and responsive computing experience. The CPU is complemented by 8GB of high-speed 3200MHz DDR4 U-DIMM RAM, which allows for maximum multitasking and smooth and efficient performance. A 512GB M.2 PCIe SSD takes storage to the next level, providing lightning-fast data access rates and enough of capacity for your apps, files, and multimedia material. The SSD not only speeds up system startup times, but also improves general system responsiveness, resulting in a fast and efficient user experience. Intel UHD Graphics 730 enhances the system's visual capabilities by offering dependable graphics performance for a wide range of workloads, including casual gaming and multimedia content consumption. The MSI PRO DP180 desktop PC is built for both productivity and elegance, with a sleek and modern appearance that complements any workstation. Whether you're a professional in need of a dependable workstation or a gamer searching for a system capable of handling the most recent titles, the MSI PRO DP180 exemplifies desktop computing innovation and performance. Upgrade your computing experience with the MSI PRO DP180, which combines power and accuracy.
